None.Name: Ground Attack
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, cannon fires a shell that deals 830 damage to enemies in a 15 radius around its target, up to 1240 in total. Affects ground targets only. Knocks back small and medium units.

None.Name: Heavy Snowball
None.Description: Activate to fire off a large snowball that deals 1700 damage to enemies in a 25m radius around their target, up to 10350 in total. Has an extremely long range of 200m but can only fire into an area where at least one other friendly ground entity is positioned. Knocks back small and medium units. Has a 30 seconds cool-down after the weapon was built. Reusable every 30 seconds.

en.Description:
Ground Attack: +40 Damage per target, 70 in total
Heavy Snowball: +100 damage per target, 550 in total

Ground Attack: +90 Damage per target, 130 in total
Heavy Snowball: +200 damage per target, 1100 in total

Ground Attack: +95 Damage per target, 145 in total
Heavy Snowball: +200 damage per target, 1200 in total

ru.Description:
Ground Attack: +40 Damage per target, 70 in total
Heavy Snowball: +100 damage per target, 550 in total

Ground Attack: +90 Damage per target, 130 in total
Heavy Snowball: +200 damage per target, 1100 in total

Ground Attack: +95 Damage per target, 145 in total
Heavy Snowball: +200 damage per target, 1200 in total

Extra.en: Total values for Heavy Snowball are not written on upgrade cards,  but are written in upgraded descriptions. Heavy Snowball is a one-time irreversible toggle that permanently changes the structure to no longer use Ground Attack but fire Heavy Snowball using an ability. This ability is free of charge.
